data.text: Hello Everyone, want to thank the staff member of CityMax Hotel Business Bay for the hospitality. as for the food at CIty Cafe,the breakfast is outstanding, the people are very friendly and extremely professional, as for dinner at City Cafe, I have no words to descrite the various food (by the way I gain like 3 kilos)...  in specially Ms. Dolly,  you guys really made me feel at home. please keep up the good work
data.title: CityMax hotel Business Bay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for choosing to stay with Citymax Business Bay. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we truly value your business.
It is a pleasure to read your kind review regarding your recent stay at Citymax Business Bay Hotel. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that the overall experience was successful. I am truly happy to know that we have managed to exceed your expectations regarding hospitality and service delivered and will not fail to pass your comments to those team members whom you have personally mentioned. Having you with us was a pleasure, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Warm Regards,
Satish Nambiar – General Manager
owner_response.author: Citymax Business Bay

data.text: Excellent Hotel.. With Wellcoming and friendly Staff! The rooms are well kept and Spacious. I appreciate the good work done by Ms. Lovely, Mr. Manmeet, Ms. Mary, Ms. Jhilik, Mr. Tahidul and All Other Friendly Staffs. Keep it up and I will come back Again..
data.title: Wonderful Stay..

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Our sincere thanks go out to you for taking the time to share your experiences with us after staying at Citymax Business Bay Hotel. Thank you for your very nice compliments for our team, they do work very hard every day to make sure our guests feel well attended to at all times and definitely are an asset to our hotel. We will certainly relay your praising comments to all of them and we are sure they will be pleased to know their efforts have been appreciated.

Having you with us was a pleasure, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Warm Regards,
Satish Nambiar – General Manager
owner_response.author: Citymax Business Bay

data.text: Citymax hôtel is Best in this location..front des tram is amazing.. Jhilik, simran, suleiman, prachi,  rajendra you People are super..i Will Côme Again.. breakfast is delicious..all atractions near thé hotel..friendly staf and welcoming atmosphère..Jay you are donc à Goodyear job
data.title: Best Ms.Jhilik and team

data.text: this hotel was very good to give any service earlier and The housekeeping guy Nur Mohammod  was incredibly friendly and my room clean everyday timely he was doing good job the location also very good food also good and i see thay have good observation on cleaning
data.title: Good  hotel in business bay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for choosing to stay with Citymax Business Bay. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we truly value your business.
Our sincere thanks go out to you for taking the time to share your experiences with us after staying at Citymax Business Bay Hotel. The feedback you provide is very valuable to us and encourages our hardworking team who genuinely care about making our guests comfortable. Thank you for your lovely comments regarding the service you received from our team members, we will make sure to share your kind words as we know it will mean a great deal to them. Once more we thank you for choosing our hotel for your holiday and very much look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Warm Regards,
Satish Nambiar – General Manager

data.text:
Reception staff suleiman is cery helpful as he is always assist me in my luggage.
Lovely jhilik tahidul and jawad are helpful and friendly as well
I am regular guest in this hotel i love to come back because of the people. 
Highly recommended.
The brew house ambiance is very nice and fiods are good as well
data.title: Staff are helpful
